verses.gen.1.1: In the beginning, God made the sky and the ground.
verses.gen.1.2: The earth had no shape and nothing in it. Everything was dark and deep. God's Spirit was moving above the water.
verses.gen.1.3: God said, 'Let there be light,' and light appeared.
verses.gen.1.4: God saw the light and it was good. He separated the light from the darkness.
verses.gen.1.5: God called the light 'day' and the darkness 'night'. There was evening and morning - that was the first day.
